reviews.review: We were not ready ! From the beginning to the end we are taken in this non stop action comedi drama with almost no time to breath ! It's crazy awesome and surprising never seen anything like this in theatre yet !!!
An experience worth all the 10 years and 19 movies leading up to this.
No spoilers- this movie was Empire Strikes Back level. You will be thrilled, mind blown & devastated. Cannot wait to see it again as we cannot stop talking about it.

This film is easily the best superhero film of all time with it's set pieces, acting and the chemistry between the actors. Josh Brolin portrays Thanos in my opinion on par with Ledgers Joker if not better than. This isn't an avengers it is Thanos part 1. My only problem with the film and it's a huge misstep is the confirmed up coming projects from marvel, ruin the sequel for this as it's sort of telling us the outcome of Thanos story and because of this I'm worried they are going to go in the wrong direction with avengers 4.
Exceeded every expectation, every emotion... mind blown!!!!!!!

It's a great film only because of the 18 films leading to it. You have to know the MCU before you watch this or you'll be lost and rather confused. Thanos s is brilliantly done he truly breaks the hollow villain issue the MCU had its a  great film if you've seen the entirety of the MCU before hand

Avengers: Infinity War is a hilarious, fulfilling, EXHILARATING, heart-pumping and heart-breaking movie that binds together the loose ends of the marvel cinematic universe, whilst ending on such a shocking note that makes the audience wanting more instantly. after 10 years of intricate buildup, Infinity War lives up to all the hype and then some!!! It's a perfect movie that gives honour to all the movies prior. Best. Film. Ever.

Infinity War Review: First 30 minutes was the best part. Pros: Narration from Thanos point of view. Choreography: AMAZING! Cons: Thanos is boring. There were references about Thanos nickname but it didn't even make sense bc he didn't even match the comic book Thanos. Freaking SMILE!!!  you can't use Thanos' nickname if he isn't smiling!  What is this a Zack Snyder movie?  jk...it's better ...but I digress   There are two types of MCU movies:  Individual and Synergistic.  This is the best out of the Synergistic along with Captain America 2 & 3; and Avengers 1.
This movie was jaw droppingly awesome. So much fun & so much hurt. 10/10 would see again
This is the greatest cinematic experience ever :D
